  • Constructor Details

    • OldGame

      public OldGame(int n, int joined, int max, UUID uuid)
      Constructs an instance of OldGame with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      n - the current state or value, which is mutable
      joined - the number of players currently joined in the game
      max - the maximum number of players allowed in the game
      uuid - the unique identifier for the game instance
